body.h1:
TEVA 2
NKI TE-VOICE ANALYSIS tool version 2.0
body.h2: Netherlands Cancer Institute tool for Tracheoesophageal Voice Analysis
body.p: For more information, visit our websites: http://www.provoxweb.info/acoustic-analyses.html and http://www.fon.hum.uva.nl/IFA-SpokenLanguageCorpora/NKIcorpora/NKI_TEVA/
This application was made possible by an unrestricted research grant from ATOS MEDICAL AB: P.O. BOX 183 SE-242 22 HÖRBY SWEDEN

Japanese translation: Akiko Kanezaki and Chiharu Kamei
German translation: Irene Jacobi and Rob van Son
